data.name: jsPizzeria
data.description:
**jsPizzeria**-in this kata you open your small pizzeria using JavaScript. So you have to write function which processes customer order and calculates total summ to pay. function accepts two arguments *order* and *products*.

*order* - is an array, each row is item of order, example of such arrray: ```[["pizza margherita", 4],["tomato juice", 5]]```
first column is title for product, second column how many items customer have ordered. *products* has information about items in restaurant, title of item, number of items and price of one item, example: ```[["pizza margherita", 12, 5.5],['pizza pepperoni', 10, 10.5],["pizza hawaiian", 5, 19.99], ["tomato juice", 20, 1]]```

you deliver item to customer of order only if you have enough items, if not you try to process next item
